name: bhvr-site
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, and React
author: Steve Simkins

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.lint: cd client && bun run lint && cd ../server && bun run lint && cd ../shared && bun run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd client && bun run lint:fix && cd ../server && bun run lint:fix && cd ../shared && bun run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd server && bun run test && cd ../client && bun run test
